headline: Verizon Extends 5G Leadership Into Smart Stadiums And Connected Vehicles
summary: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) is pushing further into 5G infrastructure for smart stadiums and connected vehicles. The company is working on 5G powered smart stadium projects that aim to support high-capacity, low-latency connectivity for fans and venue operators. Verizon is also active in automotive connectivity, including Wi Fi and 5G modules that link vehicles to the broader network. These moves extend Verizon's reach beyond traditional mobile services into sector specific connectivity...

headline: Linux Foundation Announces OCUDU Ecosystem Foundation to Accelerate Open Source AI-RAN Innovation
summary: Mobile World Congress 2026 -- The Linux Foundation (LF), the world's leading home for open collaboration on open source software, hardware, standards, and data, today announced the formation of the Open Centralized Unit Distributed Unit (OCUDU) Ecosystem Foundation, an open collaboration hub dedicated to building, scaling, and sustaining the OCUDU technical project assets and leveraging them to establish a foundational reference platform for RAN including AI based algorithms and solutions.
